item.title: Phonegap in Visual Studio – There is no script engine for file extension ‘.js’
item.description: As I recently reinstalled my Windows system, I had to re-install almost every programs I usually use again, one of them is the Visual Studio, and since I have been messing around with Phonegap these days, I had to set it up again.
